rpo.consoleAspects.grassOverlay.tooltip: Adds a slight vertical offset to the Grass Block's biome color overlay to imitate a visual bug from PS4 Edition. May cause z-fighting at certain distances
rpo.consoleAspects.progArtGrass.tooltip: Replaces the JAPPA Grass Block side textures with the Programmer Art equivalents, like in PS4 Edition
rpo.consoleAspects.bedSprites.tooltip: Replaces the 3D bed item models with 2D item textures
rpo.consoleAspects.waterOverrides.toolti: Enables biome overrides affecting water color
rpo.consoleAspects.waterMipmaps.tooltip: Enables water mipmaps, making distant water opaque
rpo.consoleAspects.blackArmorIcons.toolt: Replaces the indented armor icons with black outlined icons
rpo.consoleAspects.oldOres.tooltip: Replaces all stone ore textures with their pre-1.17/PS4 counterparts
rpo.consoleAspects.oldMusic.tooltip: Restricts background music to C418 tracks
